card_text: This card gains effects based on the total number of cards in both players' Pendulum Zones.$N●1 or more: This card gains 800 ATK and DEF.$N●2 or more: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a Pendulum Summoned monster: Destroy that monster.$N●3 or more: Monsters your opponent controls must attack this card, if able.$N●4: If this card destroys a monster by battle or by its own effect: Draw 1 card.
